titles.title: Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987
A bill entitled, the "Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from DOT, EPA, Commerce, Interior, Marine Mammal Comm.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From DOT.

bill.summary: 2/9/1987--Introduced. Tributyltin-Based Antifouling Paint Control Act of 1987 - Prohibits the use of paints containing tributyltin as an antifouling paint for painting any vessel if such paints have a steady-state release rate above a certain level. Defines "vessel" as any ship, boat, watercraft, or other marine structure. Establishes civil penalties for violations of this Act.
